org.svvrl.goal.core.aut

Class Transition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditable
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AutomatonComponent
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.GraphicComponent
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.Transition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, Editable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AltTransition, FSATransition, GameTransition

    public class Transition
extends GraphicComponent
    A transition is a direct edge from a source state to a destination state. There can be a label on a transition. Two transitions are equal if they have the same ID.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Returns:
        a transition cloned from this transition

      • clone

        public Transition clone()
        Makes a clone this transition. Note that the source state and the destination state are not changed and not cloned. Also note that the cloned transition will have the same ID as this transition.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
